name: Deep Breaths (Patsui Games, lauranto)
description:
Leave us a vote here:

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/deep-breaths

Race through the neural highways of you mind and delve deep into your subconsciousness with the power of meditation!

Avoid anxious thoughts and meditate through WOKE gates to power up your third eye in this Zen racer full of serene mindfulness.

How deep into your subconsciousness can you you descend until your focus runs out & your meditation session ends?

CONTROLS
  • Hold [W] to breathe in
  • Hold [Space] to breathe out
  • Use [A] & [D] to steer your yogi
MADE BY
  • Laura Rantonen (Programming)
  • Patrick Milvi (Everything else)

In 3 days for Ludum Dare 48.
